mapper.select: SELECT a.display_code AS displayCode, a.floor_id AS floorId, a.floor_code AS floorCode, a.floor_status AS floorStatus, a.stock AS stock, a.create_time AS createTime, a.update_time AS updateTime, a.machine_id AS machineId, a.grade AS grade, a.goods_id AS goodsId, b.commodity_name AS commodityName FROM b_floor a LEFT JOIN b_commodity b ON a.goods_id = b.commodity_id WHERE a.machine_id = #{machinesId} order by displayCode
select display_code AS displayCode from b_floor where machine_id = #{machinesId}

SELECT b.create_time AS createTime, b.display_code AS displayCode, b.floor_code AS floorCode, b.floor_id AS floorId, b.floor_status AS floorStatus, b.goods_id AS goodsId, b.grade AS grade, b.machine_id AS machineId, b.stock, b.update_time AS updateTime FROM b_spfz a LEFT JOIN b_floor b ON INSTR( a.floor_codes, b.display_code ) WHERE a.b_id = #{spfzId} AND b.grade <= #{grade} ORDER BY b.grade DESC LIMIT 1
